title: Sarsfield
body: This family name has Irish origins and seems to have been introduced in Madeira in the 18th century. In the first quarter of the 19th century, Alexandre José Sarsfield lived in Funchal, where he held the position of treasurer several times.

Funchal: Place where Alexandre José Sarsfield lived

XVIII: Origin of the Sarsfield family name in Madeira
XIX: Alexandre José Sarsfield lived in Funchal
